verses.verse: And the <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> from the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%>, even the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, going <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> through the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> to <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>;
and it went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> to <S%H3870>Luz<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>along<s%> unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H757>Archites<s%> to <S%H5852>Ataroth<s%>;

and it went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H3311>Japhletites<s%>, unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1032>Beth-horon<s%> the <S%H8481>nether<s%>, even unto <S%H1507>Gezer<s%>; and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> thereof were at the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, took their <S%H5157>inheritance<s%>.

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> was <S%H1366>thus<s%>: the border of their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> was <S%H5853>Ataroth-addar<s%>, unto <S%H1032>Beth-horon<s%> the <S%H5945>upper<s%>;

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> at <S%H4366>Michmethath<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%>; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> turned <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> unto <S%H8387>Taanath-shiloh<s%>, and <S%H5674>passed<s%> along it on the <S%H4217>east<s%> of <S%H3239>Janoah<s%>;

and it went <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H3239>Janoah<s%> to <S%H5852>Ataroth<s%>, and to <S%H5292>Naarah<s%>, and <S%H6293>reached<s%> unto <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> at the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

From <S%H8599>Tappuah<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> went along <S%H3220>westward<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H7071>Kanah<s%>; and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> thereof were at the <S%H3220>sea<s%>. This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>;

together with the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which were set <S%H3995>apart<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.

And they drove not <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H1507>Gezer<s%>: but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, and are become <S%H5647>servants<s%> to do <S%H4522>taskwork<s%>.
